item.title: Decency in Tech
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Pull Requests kicked around and ripped apart, lethal questions barked at a presenter after the “thank you” slide, the judgmental silence after an ill-placed question. Questions I asked myself 3 years ago, and finally some answers.
